description.ruby-sapphire:
An attack that may shock
the foe into flinching.
description.emerald:
An attack that may shock
the foe into flinching.
description.firered-leafgreen:
An attack using a
startling shout.
It also may make
the foe flinch.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user attacks the
foe while shouting in
a startling fashion.
It may also make the
target flinch.
